text: Lucky Jim is a 1957 British comedy movie. John Boulting directed the movie. It was based on the 1954 novel Lucky Jim by Kingsley Amis. Ian Carmichael, Terry- Thomas, Hugh Griffith, Sharon Acker, Jean Anderson, Clive Merton, Reginald Beckwith, and Maureen Connell starred in the movie. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Boulting
title: Lucky Jim (1957 movie)
